name: Simulation (Spacejet13)
description:
Controls: 

Move - WASD and Arrow Keys. Left stick and d-pad on gamepad.

Wall Cling (hold)- Shift. Left trigger on gamepad

Launch (hold) - Ctrl, Right trigger on gamepad

Pause - Esc/P or start on gamepad

Played better with a gamepad

Hello there! This is my very first game jam, and I am very pleased that I managed to finish my game.

Unfortunately for me, I spent like 2 and a half days fighting myself about art before giving up, so I had to cut my scope quite a bit. But I am glad that I could at least finish this game.

It's not the best game ever, and I could not playtest it very much, but it is here for you to try.

I hope you enjoy playing it, and I am looking forward to any feedback that  I might receive. Thanks!

P.S: Sorry for the UI, really did not have time :P

EDIT: So, I tried the HTML version and experienced enormous Lag. So if you experience the same, please download the game if you can! Thanks!

EDIT 2: Sooo apparently the spikes don't kill you in this version. Sorry! I'll fix it right after the Jam voting ends.
